content:
Ah Claude, that's all in the updated current-execution-status, GROK_CLAUDE_BRIDGE_V2.md, claude-dc-ai-ai-communication-framework.md grok-summary-for-claude.md. 

Oh, and based on Grok's research and our new context, Claude DC has 3 modes, we're only using the most basic of them now. The other 2 combined can make your live demo visions a reality it seems. Let me know what you think after reviewing these 3 files closely.
